thread.title: BRIEF-Gridsum Announces Receipt Of Preliminary Non-Binding Proposal

title: BRIEF-Gridsum Announces Receipt Of Preliminary Non-Binding Proposal
text:
May 8, 2018 / 1:25 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Gridsum Announces Receipt Of Preliminary Non-Binding Proposal Reuters Staff
May 8 (Reuters) - Gridsum Holding Inc:
* GRIDSUM ANNOUNCES RECEIPT OF PRELIMINARY NON-BINDING PROPOSAL
* GRIDSUM - GOT PRELIMINARY PROPOSAL FROM FUTUREX CAPITAL TO BUY ALL OUTSTANDING SHARES OF CO IT DOES NOT ALREADY OWN FOR $8.70/ADS IN CASH
* GRIDSUM - FUTUREX CAPITAL INTENDS TO FUND PROPOSED DEAL PRIMARILY WITH EQUITY CAPITAL AND POSSIBLY SOME DEBT CAPITAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
